title: It's Never Easy
description: A steamy, forbidden contemporary romance from USA Today Bestselling Author, Dani René. Written in the bestselling Boudreaux Universe from New York Times Bestselling Author, Kristen Proby.NeaIt was the opportunity of a lifetime. I had to be professional. But the moment my gaze lands on his, I know it’s going to be impossible. As much as my new boss drives me crazy, I can’t deny the pull toward him. He drives me up the wall, but all I want him to do is see me for who I am. He has secrets. I have heartache. Together, we’re going to find out, it’s never easy falling in love when everything is against you. JulianShe’s annoying. But she’s breathtakingly beautiful. I should never hire the girl with the purple hair, but the moment those pretty eyes locked on mine, I was lost. She drives me crazy, but I can’t deny I’m drawn to her in ways I have never felt. I’m bitter and cold. She’s warm and affectionate. Together, we’re going to find out , it’s never easy, finding happiness after heartbreak.
author: Dani René
